description.value:
Wondrous item, rare
While you wear these crystal lenses over your eyes, you can sense the presence of any dimensional portal within 60 feet of you and whether the portal is oneâ€‘way or two-way. Once you have worn the eyes for 10 minutes, their magic ceases to function until the next dawn. Putting the lenses on or off requires an action.
